radiographic_examinations.findings: Evidence of remote infarcts of the right frontal and left parietal lobes, as well as diffuse white-matter disease.

Punctate lesion in the left thalamocapsular region, hyperintense on fluid-attenuated inversion recovery (FLAIR) images, consistent with acute infarction, and evidence of other bilateral remote cerebral infarctions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings consistent with remote infarctions previously observed.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed tomographic angiography of the head and neck
radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild, partially calcified atherosclerotic plaque at the bifurcations of the bilateral common carotid arteries, no evidence of clinically significant stenosis or vasculitis.
